20110125023450.000|20110125023450.000|CC1|TONIGHT.                        
20110125023450.000|20110125023452.000|CC1|JANET, THANKS.                  
20110125023452.000|20110125023625.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110125023452.000|20110125023454.000|CC1|>>> WE HAVE MORE THIS EVENING ON
20110125023454.000|20110125023455.000|CC1|THIS CONDITION CONGRESSWOMAN    
20110125023455.000|20110125023458.000|CC1|GIFFORDS IS DEALING WITH.       
20110125023458.000|20110125023459.000|CC1|A COMMON COMPLICATION FOR PEOPLE
20110125023459.000|20110125023500.000|CC1|WITH THE KIND OF INJURY SHE IS  
20110125023500.000|20110125023502.000|CC1|FACING.                         
20110125023502.000|20110125023503.000|CC1|HERE'S OUR CHIEF SCIENCE        
20110125023503.000|20110125023506.000|CC1|CORRESPONDENT, ROBERT BAZELL.   
20110125023506.000|20110125023507.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT IS A COMMON     
20110125023507.000|20110125023509.000|CC1|COMPLICATION WITH GUNSHOT WOUNDS
20110125023509.000|20110125023510.000|CC1|TO THE BRAIN.                   
20110125023510.000|20110125023513.000|CC1|THE BRAIN IS SURROUNDED BY      
20110125023513.000|20110125023514.000|CC1|CEREBROSPINAL FLUID HELD IN     
20110125023514.000|20110125023515.000|CC1|PLACE BY A MEMBRANE CALLED THE  
20110125023515.000|20110125023517.000|CC1|DURA.                           
20110125023517.000|20110125023520.000|CC1|EVEN THE BULLET WOUND ITSELF OR 
20110125023520.000|20110125023521.000|CC1|THE SURGERY TO REPAIR IT CAN    
20110125023521.000|20110125023523.000|CC1|CAUSE A BUILDUP OF CEREBROSPINAL
20110125023523.000|20110125023525.000|CC1|FLUID, OR CSF, WHICH CAUSES THE 
20110125023525.000|20110125023527.000|CC1|FLUID TO LEAK OUT, OFTEN INTO   
20110125023527.000|20110125023529.000|CC1|THE THROAT AND NOSE AREA.       
20110125023529.000|20110125023530.000|CC1|THE BIG DANGER IS INFECTION.    
20110125023530.000|20110125023534.000|CC1|IF THE FLUID IS LEAKING OUT,    
20110125023534.000|20110125023535.000|CC1|GERMS CAN GET IN, POTENTIALLY   
20110125023535.000|20110125023536.000|CC1|CAUSING MENINGITIS.             
20110125023536.000|20110125023539.000|CC1|>> IT'S A SETBACK IN THE SENSE  
20110125023539.000|20110125023540.000|CC1|THAT IT'S KEPT HER IN THE ICU OR
20110125023540.000|20110125023542.000|CC1|THE INTENSIVE CARE UNIT FOR NOW.
20110125023542.000|20110125023543.000|CC1|BUT I ACTUALLY DON'T THINK IT'S 
20110125023543.000|20110125023545.000|CC1|GOING TO WIND UP BEING A MAJOR  
20110125023545.000|20110125023546.000|CC1|SETBACK FOR HER.                
20110125023546.000|20110125023548.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE FIRST LINE OF  
20110125023548.000|20110125023550.000|CC1|TREATMENT IS TO DRAIN OFF EXCESS
20110125023550.000|20110125023552.000|CC1|FLUID, HOPING THE FLUID BUILDUP 
20110125023552.000|20110125023554.000|CC1|WILL STOP ON ITS OWN.           
20110125023554.000|20110125023555.000|CC1|IF THAT FAILS, DOCTORS MAY      
20110125023555.000|20110125023557.000|CC1|CONSIDER ADDITIONAL SURGERY TO  
20110125023557.000|20110125023600.000|CC1|CLOSE THE LEAK OR AS A LAST     
20110125023600.000|20110125023602.000|CC1|RESORT PUT IN A PERMANENT DRAIN 
20110125023602.000|20110125023604.000|CC1|CALLED A SHUNT, BUT THAT CARRIES
20110125023604.000|20110125023607.000|CC1|AN ONGOING RISK OF INFECTION.   
20110125023607.000|20110125023608.000|CC1|UNTIL THE LEAK IS STOPPED, IT IS
20110125023608.000|20110125023609.000|CC1|UNLIKELY REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS
20110125023609.000|20110125023611.000|CC1|WILL LEAVE INTENSIVE CARE TO    
20110125023611.000|20110125023612.000|CC1|BEGIN THE REHABILITATION        
20110125023612.000|20110125023614.000|CC1|PROGRAM.                        
20110125023614.000|20110125023615.000|CC1|DOCTORS WANT TO START IT AS SOON
20110125023615.000|20110125023617.000|CC1|AS POSSIBLE, BUT THEY SAY A     
20110125023617.000|20110125023618.000|CC1|DELAY OF A FEW DAYS OR WEEKS,   
20110125023618.000|20110125023620.000|CC1|BRIAN, WON'T MAKE THAT MUCH     
20110125023620.000|20110125023623.000|CC1|DIFFERENCE.                     
20110125023623.000|20110125023624.000|CC1|>> BOB BAZELL, THANKS, AS       
20110125023624.000|20110125023625.000|CC1|ALWAYS.

20110125023627.000|20110125023629.000|CC1|30 PEOPLE ARE DEAD, MORE THAN   
20110125023629.000|20110125023632.000|CC1|150 INJURED AFTER A MASSIVE     
20110125023632.000|20110125023634.000|CC1|SUICIDE BOMBING ATTACK IN ONE OF
20110125023634.000|20110125023635.000|CC1|THE BUSIEST AIRPORTS IN ALL OF  
20110125023635.000|20110125023637.000|CC1|EUROPE, IN MOSCOW.

20110125023639.000|20110125023641.000|CC1|BOMBER WALKED INTO THE
